Hero.title: Full Stack Developer
Hero.description: Passionate about creating modern web applications with cutting-edge technologies. Ready to bring your ideas to life with clean code and innovative solutions.

About.title: About Me
About.description:
Hi, I'm a Full Stack Web Developer
Passionate about modern web technologies in developing user-friendly frontend applications and backend solutions. Always striving to write clean and efficient code and learn new technologies.

With an eye for detail and the ability to combine both technical and design aspects, I create digital experiences that not only function but also inspire. Every project is an opportunity for me to grow and innovate.

ProjectsSection.title: Few my latest works
ProjectsSection.subtitle: Discover a selection of my recent projects

Projects.description: Modern landing page for VPN service

items.question: How can I contact you about my project?
items.answer: You can reach me via →email← at alinaghihossaini@gmail.com or by using the →contact form← directly on this website Simply describe your project and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

items.question: How quickly will I receive a response?
items.answer: I typically respond within →24 hours← on business days Often much faster →Mon-Fri← Within 4-8 hours.

items.question: What information should I include in my first message?
items.answer: For a quick assessment please include →Project description← What you'd like to build →Timeline← When you'd like to start/launch →Budget range← Optional but helpful for tailored proposals.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: I accept →bank transfer← →Visa← →MasterCard← and →PayPal← providing secure payment options.
